### LeetCode Basic Bit Manupulations

1. **[231. Power of Two](https://leetcode.com/problems/power-of-two/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: `n & (n - 1)`
   * Checks understanding of binary representation
   * ⭐ Must-do

2. **[191. Number of 1 Bits](https://leetcode.com/problems/number-of-1-bits/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: Count set bits
   * Learn: `n & 1`, `n >> 1`

3. **[136. Single Number](https://leetcode.com/problems/single-number/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: XOR cancels duplicates
   * `a ^ a = 0`, `a ^ 0 = a`
   * ⭐ Very important

4. **[461. Hamming Distance](https://leetcode.com/problems/hamming-distance/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: XOR + count 1s
   * Very intuitive

5. **[476. Number Complement](https://leetcode.com/problems/number-complement/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: Flip bits
   * Learn masking

6. **[190. Reverse Bits](https://leetcode.com/problems/reverse-bits/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: Bit shifting + masking

7. **[338. Counting Bits](https://leetcode.com/problems/counting-bits/){target="_blank"}**

   * Concept: DP + bit counting
   * Extension of problem 191
